css: body { background: rgb(235, 230, 223); }

img { max-width: 100%; transition: opacity 0.5s ease-out 0s; }
img.image-did-not-load { display: none; }
.is-loading[_ngcontent-c22] { pointer-events: none; opacity: 0.2; }
.usabilla_live_button_container { display: none; }
[x-extract-css-inline-style] { padding-top: 0 }
[x-extract-css-inline-style] { display: none; }
[x-extract-css-inline-style] { visibility: hidden; }
[x-extract-css-inline-style] { opacity: 1; }
[x-extract-css-inline-style] { transition-duration: 0ms; transform: translate3d(-800px, 0px, 0px); }
[x-extract-css-inline-style] { width: 800px; }
